title: Short Stories of Jorge Luis Borges - The Giovanni Translations (
description:
This is an update to my prior compilation of the Giovanni translations of Borges, incorporating over three dozen corrections submitted by the community (thanks all!), as well as the Giovanni translations of 'The Library of Babel', 'A Glimpse into the Work of Herbert Quain', and 'The Garden of Branching Paths.'

Also as a result of community feedback and discussion with fellow Borges lovers, I decided to include the Kerrigan translations of a half-dozen more of what are widely considered crucial Borges works. While this wanders a bit from the mission statement of this collection, the Kerrigan translations are still light-years ahead of those by Hurley, and I agree with those who'd rather I include them than allow them to gather dust. 

As before, these e-texts are offered in DRM-free EPUB & MOBI format with an active Table of Contents, and include works from:


The Aleph & Other Stories
A History of Infamy
The Book of Sand
In Praise of Darkness
Doctor Brodie's Report
The Garden of Branching Paths
Labyrinths
The Book of Imaginary Beings


Enjoy!
